title: Evidence
creator_credit: Igor Vamos, Steve Kurtz, Claire Pentecost and Critical Art Ensemble
brief_description: Video evidence of the FBI raid of Professor Steve Kurtz’s home which led to his being charged with bio terrorism. The video has a voice over relating the history of events, and shows the aftermath of the FBI raids. This video was created specifically for the exhibition PROOF held in the ACMI screen gallery December 2004.
